Text: If you have troubles downloading, direct download links are available on Yandex.Narod. It is Russian hosting service, and it doesn't require registration, but you need to pass CAPTCHA. And you also may use MiPony for downloading, thal'll be a little bit easier.
I couldn't post DDLs here, but again, if you have troubles finding them, e-mail me to samwised @ yandex . ru (with no spaces). Will be glad to help.
